title: Study of a Woman's Head
medium: black chalk and wash heightened with white
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Louis Antoine Leon Riesener [1808-1878], Paris, France; his estate sale April 10-11, 1879 [1]; Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by December 4, 1975 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1975. 

Notes:
[1]. Vente Riesener stamp, L. 2139, on recto, lower right. 
[2]. Received at the museum on December 4, 1975.

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
